title: Foucault's Pendulum cover?
content:
[http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0345368754/qid=1095905908/sr=8-1/ref=sr\_8\_xs\_ap\_i1\_xgl14/103-5421483-8309430?v=glance&s=books&n=507846](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225149/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0345368754/qid=1095905908/sr=8-1/ref=sr_8_xs_ap_i1_xgl14/103-5421483-8309430?v=glance&s=books&n=507846)   
   
it's pretty rad, whatever it is.
author: abenoboy

comments.content:
Closest I can find is [Eva/Koch Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516225149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/eva-sg/eva-paramount-ult-sg/testdrive.html?s=FOUCAULT%27S+PENDULUM&p=48) but it's not an exact match.   
   
It's pretty rad, tho.
